name: Blood Rage
book: Pathfinder Companion: Orcs of Golarion. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (a drop of blood from each creature to be affected)
text: The targets of this spell become angrier as they fight, the pain of their wounds fueling their strength. An affected creature gains a cumulative +2 morale bonus to Strength and a cumulative -1 penalty to AC for every 5 points of damage it takes (maximum +10 Strength, -5 AC) for the duration of the spell. These bonuses last until the spell expires or the target falls unconscious.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (每个被影响生物的一滴血液)
target_zh: 一个自愿的生物/2等级，认两者之间不得相距超过30呎
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 此法术的受术者们在战斗中变得愤怒，伤口的疼痛激发了他们的力量。在法术持续时间内，一名受影响的生物每受到5点伤害，他就会在力量属性上获得可累加的+2士气加值，以及在AC上承受可累加的-1减値(最大+10力量，-5AC)。这些加值持续到法术结束，或是该生物陷入昏迷为止。
